name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircularClosedGaugeView
desc: A template for displaying a SwiftUI view inside a closed circular gauge.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, label: Label)
items.desc: Creates a new template with a closed circular gauge, and a SwiftUI view in the center.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge provider for the template.

items.name: var label: Label
items.desc: The SwiftUI view displayed by the template.

declaration: final class CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircularClosedGaugeView<Label> : CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicCircular where Label : View
